Package com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs

This package and its subpackages contain several convenience TypeCodecs.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MappingCodec<O,I>
    An abstract TypeCodec that maps a Java Pojo to another Java object that can in turn be serialized into a CQL type.
    ParsingCodec<T>
    An abstract TypeCodec that stores JAVA objects as serialized strings.

Package com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs Description

This package and its subpackages contain several convenience TypeCodecs.

Package Description
com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.arrays codecs mapping CQL lists to Java arrays.
com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.date codecs mapping CQL temporal types to Java primitive types.
com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.enums codecs mapping CQL types to Java enums.
com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.guava codecs mapping CQL types to Guava-specific Java types.
com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.jdk8 codecs mapping CQL types to Java 8 types, including java.time API and java.util.Optional.
com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.joda codecs mapping CQL types to Joda Time types.
com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.json codecs mapping CQL varchars to JSON structures.
